page.title: 05Rare Farm Animal Sanctuary
page.content: Mr Brooks has recently opened the Rare Farm Animal Sanctuary at Great Hollanden,Hildenborough.Mr Joe Henson originally thought of the idea and Mr Brooks liked it.It took 3 years to build the Sanctuary and to get 60 rare breeds of animals.The aim of this centre is to preserve rare species,it is a home for over 100 animals.Mr Brooks put a huge amount of effort into finding the animals,he travelled the length of Britain. The animals are kept in large en_ closures in what was an arable field last year.Here are some of the rare breeds:shaggy highland cattle, Hebridean sheep,Anglo-Nubian goats, Bagot goats,Eriskay ponies and Welsh belted black cattle.Many of these animals could soon be extint. Alan and Daniel.
